SearchManagementClient SearchManagementClient Class

In this Article

Edit

Client that can be used to manage Azure Search services and API keys.

Syntax

public class SearchManagementClient : Rest.ServiceClient<SearchManagementClient>, ISearchManagementClient, IDisposable, IAzureClientPublic Class SearchManagementClient

    Implements ISearchManagementClient, IDisposable, IAzureClient
